name: This_form_is_for_col_mp_bags_in_the_field
label: This form is for collecting decomp bags in the field
hint: You will retrieve 4 bags from every site - Subplot 1: row A and B and Subplot 2: row A and B

name: out_Shake_the_dirt_and_debris
label: Shake the dirt off and out of your bags - pull out weeds that have grown inside

name: Return_bags_to_lab_t_g_on_moisture_levels
label: Return bags to lab to dry at 60C for about 2 days, depending on moisture levels
